name: Layer 2
description: Sets up Layer2 for use with NextLib

files.name: {projectName}.bas
files.template:
' Project: {projectName}
' Type: Layer 2
' Generated by NextBuild Project Creator

'!org=24576
' NextBuild Layer2 Template 

#define NEX 
#define IM2 

#include <nextlib.bas>

' Load font5 from system into bank 32 
LoadSDBank("[]font5.spr",0,0,0,32)
' set up Layer2 320x256
InitLayer2(MODE320X256)
' show the layer2 
ShowLayer2(1)
' print using Full Layer2 Text, bank 32
FL2Text(0,0,"WELCOME TO NEXT BUILD",32)

do 
    ' forever loop 
    WaitRaster(192)
loop
